title: Diemme AR260BS-C Industrial Membrane Press
item_description:
Diemme AR260BS-C Industrial Membrane Press

  • Make: Diemme
  • Model: AR260BS
  • Year of manufacture: 1998
  • Footprint width: 106”
  • Footprint length: 317”
  • Height to top of tank: 117”

Removal Note: This lot has a different removal period from the rest of the items in this sale. This item is only available for removal between March 3rd, and March 14th (weekdays only) between 9:00 AM and 3:30 PM each day. Buyer is responsible for all aspects of disassembly, loading, and removal of this item. No loading assistance of any kind will be provided. The seller will handle electrical disconnection, as well as disconnection from plumbing and air. A COI will be required in advance from the buyer and all contractors the buyer uses for disassembly, loading, trucking, packaging, and/or any other work that takes place at the sale location on behalf of the buyer. Please bid accordingly.
